data.text:
Larry Miller

Larry William Miller, age 88, passed away peacefully on Thursday, July 6, 2023, surrounded by his family. Larry is survived by his son, L. Brent Miller (Bonnie Weaver-Miller), and his grandchildren, Grace Elizabeth (Nick) Smeenk, Chase Weaver (Megan), Adeline Marie (Shane Smith), John “Jack” William, and Megan Elise (Alex) Adrion. He has four great grandchildren, Charlotte “Charlie” Christina Smeenk, Jasper Wren Smeenk, Brent Thomas Miller, and Anna Catherine Miller. Larry is also survived by his sister Elaine (Jim) Williams. He is preceded in death by his parents, his wife, Helen Elizabeth “Betty” Miller (October 15, 2016), and their daughter, Christina Lynn Miller (April 11, 2012).
